Ive had a couple times where I had some potty language come thru, f you and=
 ahole whore and the like. I just told them hey knock off the foul language=
 please=C2=A0and a lil bit later got a sorry.=C2=A0 I found that being firm=
 but polite is prolly the best way to handle it. I always use the treat oth=
ers(even the dead)=C2=A0how I wish to be treated and it usually works out w=
ell.=C2=A0 If that doesnt work tell them foul language isnt allowed here an=
d if they cant respect that then they need to leave...try ignoring it if th=
ey dont stop....cant get your goat if they arent getting attention and pret=
ty soon, like a child, they will stop because it becomes boring.
=C2=A0
Hop=
e this helps.
Rhonda

--- On Fri, 10/8/10, Adriana Jones <adrianamjones@yah=
oo.com> wrote:


From: Adriana Jones <adrianamjones@...>
Subject: [EV=
P-ITC] Vulgar Voices
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Friday, October 8, 2=
010, 12:42 PM


=C2=A0 



I know that there are many spirits who are vulga=
r, malicious, liars, troublemakers, etc. Last night I did my first ghost bo=
x session alone, (my second session overall - or third if I count the synth=
 voice box session). During the session, I was feeling a little bit self-co=
nscious and discouraged, not sure if it would work for me alone, etc. so my=
 mood was a little down, maybe negative.... also I'm a relatively young fem=
ale (28). I'm wondering if its due to those two factors that I received - u=
pon going back to listen to the recorded session (I'll try to post files up=
 later for confirmation)... a series of unwelcoming and vulgar messages... =
toward the beginning of the session someone said "you're too young" and the=
n a while into it I got "h* cheats, hit me hit me hit me hit me"... and the=
n toward the end of the session I got "a**hole". (Frank, please let me know=
 if I've crossed the line as far as posting up vulgar words on this group -=
 not sure how else
 to discuss my session, lol... and I do apologize)

So h=
ere's the thing, I can alter my attitude, to be more positive, but I can't =
alter my age and gender... so any other females get vulgar messages like th=
is? And what can I do about it? What should I say? I really have no desire =
to continue with these sessions if this is how I get treated... I guess I w=
as an easy target, just starting out with the ghost box, and not being a co=
nfident type, I'm a shy, timid, walk-all-over-me type too often.... how do =
I "administer discipline" in this situation? Does it work to just tell them=
 to please stop it, or that you're not welcome if you don't behave, etc? Or=
 does that only egg them on further? Help!
